channel.title: Tranquility - Where Custom Lovers Go! | Daily Updates | Community Driven | Award
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Tranquility is currently ran by just one owner and no staff. The server is currently in BETA and is being redone completely. We currently just got a new source & client! We will have items like other custom RSPS's. There are all the custom torvas, custom katanas, and recolored other customs. We just released a new forum that we are also working on. If you have played the old Tranquility and disappointed..Then give us another try! You will not regret it. Many positions are open and the player base is growing much more then previously. Come join Tranquility, you will be hooked and not want to leave!
Pictures will be added later. [/size]
[size=18pt]Website: http://tranquility317.x10.mx/portal.php
Hope to see you soon!
-Xlrators[/CENTER][/size]

item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Can’t seem to get the client working.
When the cache was at users, i had a connection error.

Deleted cache attempted to re-download cache connection error again.
Deleted cache re-download client, opened it again requesting title screen.

item.title: Tranquility - Where Custom Lovers Go! | Daily Updates | Community Driven | Award
item.dc:creator: @Xlrators Xlrators
item.description:
@Xlrators wrote:

Yeah I tried to cut down on the “grind” of course there will still be “grinding” but at least trying to make it enjoyable with rewards and achievements.
Also were branching off the content and just using the items to make newer items down the road as well.
Can’t wait to see you on. Alot of people are in different timezone’s so usually at least couple on at a time for the first day at least.

Read full topic
item.source: Tranquility - Where Custom Lovers Go! | Daily Updates | Community Driven | Award

item.title: Tranquility - Where Custom Lovers Go! | Daily Updates | Community Driven | Award
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Going to hop on, Vestige-x is a nice source and has some cool customs.
Hopefully you won’t stick to much to the base, and extend the amount of customs step wise.
As for the content, i will give my opinion later. Servers like this are usually easy to play and mean a lot of grinding.

Read full topic
